description.brief: Teleop (keyboard) for mobile plattform Slider and robot arm Mover4 by Commonplace Robotics.

package.description:
This node reads the keyboard and generates Twist and/or JointState messeges in a 10 Hz loop. For the slider the keys are ws for forward/backward, ad for turn left/right and qe for lateral motion which is possible due to the mecanum drive.
This node is inteded to be a test environment for the hardware interface to the CPR robots, cpr_robots_hwinterface.
package.author: christian.meyer@cpr-robots.com
